input_arguments.description: Computer name to find a mount on.
Package checking command. Debian - dpkg -s samba
Package installer command. Debian - apt install samba

dependencies.description: Package with smbstatus (samba) must exist on device
dependencies.prereq_command: if #{package_checker} > /dev/null; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

input_arguments.description: Package checking command. pkg info -x samba
Package installer command. pkg install -y samba413

dependencies.description: Package with smbstatus (samba) must exist on device
dependencies.prereq_command: if #{package_checker} > /dev/null; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

atomic_tests.name: Network Share Discovery command prompt
atomic_tests.description:
Network Share Discovery utilizing the command prompt. The computer name variable may need to be modified to point to a different host
Upon execution available network shares will be displayed in the powershell session

input_arguments.description: Computer name to find a mount on.

atomic_tests.name: Network Share Discovery PowerShell
atomic_tests.description:
Network Share Discovery utilizing PowerShell. The computer name variable may need to be modified to point to a different host
Upon execution, available network shares will be displayed in the powershell session

atomic_tests.name: View available share drives
atomic_tests.description: View information about all of the resources that are shared on the local computer Upon execution, available share drives will be displayed in the powershell session

atomic_tests.name: Share Discovery with PowerView
atomic_tests.description: Enumerate Domain Shares the current user has access. Upon execution, progress info about each share being scanned will be displayed.

dependencies.description: Endpoint must be joined to domain

atomic_tests.name: PowerView ShareFinder
atomic_tests.description: PowerView is a PowerShell tool to gain network situational awareness on Windows domains. ShareFinder finds (non-standard) shares on machines in the domain.

dependencies.description: Invoke-ShareFinder module must exist in %TEMP% directory

atomic_tests.name: WinPwn - shareenumeration
atomic_tests.description: Network share enumeration using the shareenumeration function of WinPwn

atomic_tests.name: Network Share Discovery via dir command
atomic_tests.description:
Network Share Discovery utilizing the dir command prompt. The computer ip variable may need to be modified to point to a different host ip
Upon execution available network shares will be displayed in the commandline session

input_arguments.description: Computer IP to find a mount on.

atomic_tests.name: Enumerate All Network Shares with SharpShares
atomic_tests.description:
SharpShares is a command line tool that can be integrated with Cobalt Strike's execute-assembly module, allowing for the enumeration of network shares. 
This technique has been utilized by various ransomware groups, including BianLian.
[Reference](https://www.cisa.gov/news-events/cybersecurity-advisories/aa23-136a)

input_arguments.description: File to output enumeration results to

dependencies.description: The SharpShares executable must exist on disk

atomic_tests.name: Enumerate All Network Shares with Snaffler
atomic_tests.description:
Snaffler is an open-source tool that has been used by various threat groups, including Scattered Spider/Muddled Libra, to enumerate accessible shares and credential-containing files within a domain. 
[Reference](https://unit42.paloaltonetworks.com/muddled-libra/)

executor.name: powershell
executor.procedure: invoke-expression 'cmd /c start powershell -command { cmd /c "#{snaffler_path}" -a -o "#{output_path}" }; start-sleep 90; stop-process -name "snaffler"'

input_arguments.description: File to output enumeration results to

dependencies.description: The Snaffler executable must exist on disk
